resources.string:
• When using speech recognition, try to speak loud & clear.

 • "Write Custom Text" allows you to manually write the text you want to display. You may also save it to a file for future use.

 • "Choose File" allows you to import a text file to display its content. Use only ".doc", ".docx" or ".txt" files.

 • Since this app is under development please be patient if something is not working & feel free to contact me & suggest changes.

 • To use speed recognition offline, you should have the language installed on your device. Look for "Ok Google" settings. • Use speed recognition with network connection for better performance.
